A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is honestly one of the worst movies I've seen in some time. Nothing surprising. The questions raised in Force Awakens remain unanswered. Sure many of the SFX might be great for people to watch but as a movie\, there are no good plot lines. Characters are being wasted as they don't develop in any way. There was an entire plot line that simply took up screen time for the sake of.\n\nIt will be better that J.J. Abrams returns for the last movie because Rian Johnson pretty much screwed everything up
